custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetCategory INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetCategories ON (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.categoryId = AssetCategory.categoryId) WHERE (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId IN ( SELECT entryId FROM AssetEntry WHERE (AssetEntry.groupId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) )) AND (AssetCategory.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetCategory [$JOIN$] WHERE (AssetCategory.groupId = ?) AND (AssetCategory.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL)

SELECT {AssetCategory.*} FROM AssetCategory INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetCategories ON (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.categoryId = AssetCategory.categoryId) AND (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId = ?)
SELECT {AssetCategory.*} FROM AssetCategory WHERE (AssetCategory.groupId = ?) AND (lower(AssetCategory.name) = ?)

SELECT {AssetCategory.*} FROM AssetCategory INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetCategories ON (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.categoryId = AssetCategory.categoryId) INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.entryId = AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId) WHERE (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = ?)
SELECT {AssetCategory.*} FROM AssetCategory [$JOIN$] WHERE (AssetCategory.groupId = ?) AND (AssetCategory.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL) ORDER BY AssetCategory.name ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetCategoryProperty.value) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetCategoryProperty INNER JOIN AssetCategory ON (AssetCategory.categoryId = AssetCategoryProperty.categoryId) WHERE (AssetCategory.groupId = ?) AND (AssetCategoryProperty.key_ = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT AssetCategoryProperty.value AS categoryPropertyValue FROM AssetCategoryProperty INNER JOIN AssetCategory ON (AssetCategory.categoryId = AssetCategoryProperty.categoryId) WHERE (AssetCategory.groupId = ?) AND (AssetCategoryProperty.key_ = ?) ORDER BY AssetCategoryProperty.value ASC
SELECT DISTINCT AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId FROM AssetEntries_AssetCategories WHERE categoryId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId FROM AssetEntries_AssetCategories INNER JOIN AssetCategory ON (AssetCategory.categoryId = AssetEntries_AssetCategories.categoryId) WHERE (AssetCategory.leftCategoryId BETWEEN ? AND ?)
SELECT DISTINCT AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId FROM AssetEntries_AssetTags WHERE tagId = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetTag INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId = AssetTag.tagId) WHERE (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId IN ( SELECT entryId FROM AssetEntry WHERE (AssetEntry.groupId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) )) AND (AssetTag.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetTag [$JOIN$] WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND (AssetTag.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL)
SELECT {AssetTag.*} FROM AssetTag INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId = AssetTag.tagId) AND (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = ?)
SELECT {AssetTag.*} FROM AssetTag WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND (lower(AssetTag.name) = ?)

SELECT {AssetTag.*} FROM AssetTag INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId = AssetTag.tagId) INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.entryId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId) WHERE (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = ?)

SELECT {AssetTag.*} FROM AssetTag INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId = AssetTag.tagId) WHERE (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId IN ( SELECT entryId FROM AssetEntry WHERE (AssetEntry.groupId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) )) AND (AssetTag.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL) ORDER BY AssetTag.name ASC
SELECT {AssetTag.*} FROM AssetTag [$JOIN$] WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND (AssetTag.name LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL) ORDER BY AssetTag.name ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetTagProperty.value) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetTagProperty INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetTagProperty.tagId) WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND (AssetTagProperty.key_ = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT AssetTagProperty.value AS tagPropertyValue FROM AssetTagProperty INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetTagProperty.tagId) WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND (AssetTagProperty.key_ = ?) ORDER BY AssetTagProperty.value ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetTagProperty.key_) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetTagProperty INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetTagProperty.tagId) WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND

SELECT DISTINCT AssetTagProperty.key_ AS tagPropertyKey FROM AssetTagProperty INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetTagProperty.tagId) WHERE (AssetTag.groupId = ?) AND ORDER BY tagPropertyKey ASC
